feed.title: [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] Review of Smart Contract Concepts

entry.title: [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] Review of Smart Contract Concepts
entry.summary: In this blog post, Jeremy Rubin discusses some high-level smart contract concepts that can be associated with different opcodes or proposals. He invites readers to share their thoughts on other relevant properties. The post is available at rubin.io and was published on December 4, 2021.
